subtitle: This filling could also be used  to stuff peppers, tomatoes or even onions.

method.text: Preheat grill to a medium heat.
Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the onion and garlic and fry together for 2-3 min, or until softened.
Add the mince to the pan. Fry for 2 min, stirring occasionally until browned. Stir in the tomatoes, tomato puree, pine kernels and seasoning. Simmer for 10 min.
Meanwhile, place the courgettes in a large saucepan of boiling water. Bring to the boil then simmer for 5 min or until tender.
Carefully remove the courgettes from the pan and cut each in half lengthways. Leaving a 5mm border around the edge, scoop out the centre of each courgette and roughly chop the flesh.
Stir the chopped courgette into the mince mixture with the chives. Spoon into the courgette cases. Place the courgettes under the grill for 5 min to warm through and serve.

title: Mediterranean stuffed courgettes
